WRITING.TEXT: I can only work at night and I save everything for the hours of 9 to sunrise. My brain functions better and when it's quiet out, I can get everything written out much better

8 years ago, I felt my heart racing and my temperature rising. I felt so hot that I knew I was sweating and had to leave the room and collapsed outside. It passed but I could've sworn I was having a heart attack or something.
Later that day, I learned my cousin had died in a fire and had a heart attack before he died.
The excuse of "special projects." I don't know how many times I heard that I was getting assigned a "special project" just to learn that the person it originally belonged to didn't want to do it.
Hopefully still in bed watching Criminal Minds
Art no but photography and writings yes. I'm also always writing on the writing prompts section.
That's where the freelance writing and art comes in lol. It only took a few years of denying myself but here we are now.
When I realized I was much happier out of work than making money and working 9-5 everyday like everyone says you're supposed to do.
